spell1.name: CHAOS CONTROL
spell1.description: Unleash Chaos Magic on enemies to deal damage based on a percentage of their Max Health and restore Chaos Energy.

attributes.label: RANGE
attributes.value: A cylindrical spell field with a radius of 3m and a height of 20m

attributes.label: SPECIAL EFFECT
attributes.value: Attacks the nearest enemy within range

spell2.name: REALITY ERASURE
spell2.description: Engage in free-flight while charging energy, then unleash it to deal massive damage.

attributes.label: SLOW RATE
attributes.value: Begin to slow down by 1.5s, with the effect gradually increasing to -25% by 3.5s

attributes.label: SPECIAL EFFECT
attributes.value: Enters a free-flight state upon cast

spell3.name: MYSTIC PROJECTION
spell3.description: Enter the Phased state for free-flight. Press again to exit early.

attributes.label: SPECIAL EFFECT
attributes.value: Invincibility and immunity to all crowd control when phasing

spell4.name: DARK SEAL
spell4.description: Land a hit on a target or the scene, or press E to generate a Force Field that periodically Stuns enemies within range.

attributes.label: CASTING
attributes.value: Straight-line projectile that generates a spell field upon impact

attributes.label: SPECIAL EFFECT
attributes.value: Effect activates upon hitting a target or environment, but can be activated early in mid-air by pressing E.

spell6.name: CHTHONIAN BURST
spell6.description: Consume Chaos Energy to fire explosive magic missiles, damaging enemies.

attributes.label: CASTING
attributes.value: Straight-line projectile that generates a spell field upon impact
